minecraft:snap_to_surface_feature.title: behavior.snap_to_surface_feature
minecraft:snap_to_surface_feature.description:
'minecraft:snap_to_surface_feature' snaps the y-value of a feature placement pos to the floor or the ceiling within the provided 'vertical_search_range'. The placement biome is preserved. If the snap position goes outside of the placement biome, placement will fail.
See https://bedrock.dev/docs/stable/Features#minecraft%3Asnap_to_surface_feature

feature_to_snap.description: Named reference of feature to be snapped

vertical_search_range.description: Range to search for a floor or ceiling for snaping the feature.

surface.description: Defines the surface that the y-value of the placement position will be snapped to. Valid values: 'ceiling', 'floor' and 'random_horizontal'

allow_underwater_placement.description: Features can be snapped through water as well as air.}
